text: Happy Birthday to Me is a 1981 Canadian American horror movie directed by J. Lee Thompson and starring Melissa Sue Anderson, Glenn Ford, Lawrence Dane, Sharon Acker, Frances Hyland, Matt Craven, Tracey E. Bregman, Jack Blum. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1981 horror movies Category:1980s serial killer movies Category:Canadian horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:Movies directed by J. Lee Thompson Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Massachusetts Category:Movies set in Montreal
title: Happy Birthday to Me
